title: The Iron Giant in the Scrapheap

events.description: Alto and Mina stumble upon a pile of inactive robots in the junkyard.

events.speaker: Alto
events.text: Whoa... look at this one. It's huge. Pre-war model, maybe?

events.speaker: Mina
events.text: It feels... sad. Like it's sleeping.

events.description: Mina touches the robot's chest. A faint blue light glows.

events.speaker: Robot
events.text: SYSTEM... REBOOT. TARGET... CONFIRMED. PROTECT... MINA.

events.speaker: Alto
events.text: It knows your name?! Hey, big guy, are you friend or foe?

events.speaker: Robot
events.text: FRIEND. NAME... GADGET. ASSIGNED ROLE... TANK.
